name: LPS Prototype
description:
This is a prototype for a local multiplayer shooter.
2-4 players fight in an arena.
Your weapon fires a line that is presitant in the world.
If a player touches a line that was not fired by them they will die and give the other player a point.

First to 15 points win.

The prototype consits of

  • 2 Levels
  • 2-4 players
  • Xbox/PS4 controller support
  • 1 Gamemode (Death match)

Any feedback would be greatly appreciated. My main goal for this project was to take a idea for a simple game and make it as playable as possible for a prototype.
